title: Crime Alert 05.01.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 05.01.19
description:
Mother and daughter charged after using a drone to drop a package filled with tobacco and cell phones over the walls of a Florida prison.  Indianapolis man receives 115 years sentence for the assault and murder of woman in 1998. DNA solves another cold case from 25 years ago.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
